rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Expansive entrance with Art Deco elements, featuring geometric patterns and bold lines. The design ensures smooth transition to the central living area while adhering to Vastu principles for auspicious energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious open-plan living space designed in Art Deco style with modern farmhouse aesthetics, featuring exposed wooden beams and vintage metal accents. The room is oriented to receive optimal sunlight as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space adjacent to the living area, with a minimalist farmhouse style table setup and Art Deco decorative motifs. The layout supports communal gatherings in line with joint family requirements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern farmhouse kitchen that is functional for a joint family setup. It includes ample storage, a central island, and Art Deco finishes on cabinetry and fixtures, designed to facilitate efficient workflow while respecting Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. The design incorporates farmhouse simplicity fused with Art Deco detailing in light fixtures and window frames, ensuring a calm atmosphere aligned with Vastu principles for restful sleep.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom to accommodate extended family members. The room features farmhouse-inspired decor with Art Deco accents in accessories and furnishings, designed to be versatile and comfortable.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: A dedicated space for joint family activities such as watching TV or casual meetings. The design combines modern farmhouse elements with subtle Art Deco geometric patterns, ensuring a vibrant yet relaxed ambience.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Studio Area
rooms.description: This studio space is intended for art, hobbies, or as an additional work area. The design fuses Art Deco elegance with farmhouse simplicity, providing a versatile and inspiring environment.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional guest bathroom designed with classic farmhouse style and minimal Art Deco elements, ensuring privacy and convenience for visitors in line with joint family living requirements.

openings.description: Large entrance door with Art Deco detailing to welcome energy while maintaining security. Aligned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Expansive windows providing ample natural light, designed in farmhouse style with decorative Art Deco frames that enhance both aesthetics and ventilation per local norms.

A dedicated opening ensuring easy access to the swimming pool area. The design integrates seamlessly with the Art Deco theme, balancing modernity with farmhouse charm while abiding by local safety codes.

Provides an outdoor space for relaxation and family gatherings, designed with a mix of farmhouse simplicity and Art Deco ornamentation. The balcony adheres to Vastu recommendations for auspicious energy circulation.
Separate service door for deliveries and maintenance work, ensuring that the main entrance remains uncluttered and in line with modern building norms.

additional_features.description: A spacious swimming pool integrated into the rear garden area, designed to blend Art Deco elegance with farmhouse functionality. The pool is located at an auspicious position per Vastu principles.
A landscaped courtyard that serves as a transitional space between indoor and outdoor areas, incorporating native plants and Art Deco inspired water features to enhance the overall aesthetic.
